name: `SEVAK' Society for Empowerment through Voluntary Action in Karnataka
briefDescription: SEVAK is a registered Soceity.  Registered in the year 2009 under the Karnataka Socieities Registrtion Act, 1960 in Belgaum.  The main aim of the organisation is to organise disadvantaged communities around issues related to food, income, employment, health and education securities and human resources development.  The Society focuses towards gender equity, right based issues to developmetn and environment issues. Eversince its inception the Society has concentrated on children, women, youth and tribal communities in Belgaum and Uttar Kananda districts of Karnataka.
